org.openimaj.math.model.fit

Interface RANSAC.StoppingCondition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RANSAC.BestFitStoppingCondition, RANSAC.NumberInliersStoppingCondition, RANSAC.PercentageInliersStoppingCondition, RANSAC.ProbabilisticMinInliersStoppingCondition
    Enclosing class:
    RANSAC<I,D,M extends EstimatableModel<I,D>>

    public static interface RANSAC.StoppingCondition
    Interface for classes that can control RANSAC iterations

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean finalFitCondition(int numInliers)
      Should the model be considered to fit after the final iteration has passed?
      boolean init(List<?> data, EstimatableModel<?,?> model)
      Initialise the stopping condition if necessary.
      boolean shouldStopIterations(int numInliers)
      Should we stop iterating and return the model?

    • Method Detail

      • init

        boolean init(List<?> data,
           EstimatableModel<?,?> model)
        Initialise the stopping condition if necessary. Return false if the initialisation cannot be performed and RANSAC should fail
        Parameters:
        data - The data being fitted
        model - The model to fit
        Returns:
        true if initialisation is successful, false otherwise.

      • shouldStopIterations

        boolean shouldStopIterations(int numInliers)
        Should we stop iterating and return the model?
        Parameters:
        numInliers - number of inliers in this iteration
        Returns:
        true if the model is good and iterations should stop

      • finalFitCondition

        boolean finalFitCondition(int numInliers)
        Should the model be considered to fit after the final iteration has passed?
        Parameters:
        numInliers - number of inliers in the final model
        Returns:
        true if the model fits, false otherwise
